title: FS: 4 Back Sweet Caporal Bill Lattimore ***BEST OFFER***
author: Gradedcardman

posts.post_title: FS: 4 Back Sweet Caporal Bill Lattimore ***BEST OFFER***
posts.post_content:
For sale or best offer for the card pictured below. This is a 4 back Sweet Caporal Bill Lattimore. Clearly are parts of 4 different backs are seen. The card grades fair but is very clean less the front right corner. 

BEST OFFER

PM gets priority in order.
4-backs are extremely tough. Good luck with sale.
It is surprising how long you and I have bumping our 4 back miscuts (your's more of a miscut than mine) after AH have had them sell for more than $1000.

[quote name="bn2cardz" post=1350306]It is surprising how long you and I have bumping our 4 back miscuts (your's more of a miscut than mine) after AH have had them sell for more than $1000.[/QUOTE]

It's clearly in the write up. There's no mention of this being "The finest example extant". :D

[quote name="wolf441" post=1350310]It's clearly in the write up. There's no mention of this being "The finest example extant". :D[/QUOTE]

Well as the seller of the other one being constantly bumped on this board, his is  "the finest example for sale currently" :D

Again looking for best offer..
Thanks

Last shot before looking elsewhere. 

Thanks,
Adam
